hero.name: Rishav Tiwari
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: A passionate developer with 8+ years of experience creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Creating responsive and performant web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Designing intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that provide excellent user experiences.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Building cross-platform mobile applications that work seamlessly on iOS and Android.

experience.description: Leading the frontend development team in building responsive and accessible web applications using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Designed user interfaces for mobile and web applications, conducted user research, and created wireframes and prototypes.
Managed a team of designers, established design systems, and ensured consistent user experiences across all products.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Working with John was an absolute pleasure. He understood our vision from the start and delivered a website that exceeded our expectations. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are impressive.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: John's technical expertise and creative approach transformed our outdated platform into a modern, user-friendly system. He communicated clearly throughout the process and delivered on time and within budget.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: I've worked with many developers, but John stands out for his combination of technical skill and design sensibility. He doesn't just code solutions; he thinks through the entire user experience.

projects.title: Two-Player Quiz Game
projects.description: Developed a responsive two-player quiz game with Trivia API integration, featuring dynamic questions, real-time score tracking, and engaging gameplay mechanics. Focused on efficient state management, API interaction, and adaptive design for an immersive experience deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: Voice AI Agent
projects.description: Designed and developed an advanced voice AI agent powered by Gemini AI and YouTube's API, enabling seamless real-time speech recognition and intelligent voice interactions. Integrated APIs to enhance command execution and dynamic content retrieval, ensuring high accuracy, scalability, and an engaging user experience.

projects.title: Memory Chatbot
projects.description: Built a smart, multi-AI chatbot with dynamic memory and real-time responses. Features a sleek, responsive UI, smooth performance, and natural conversationsâ€”designed for futuristic, human-like interaction across devices.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and skills. Features glassmorphism design, smooth animations, blog integration, and optimized performance for an engaging user experience.

projects.title: AI Image Prompt Matching Tool
projects.description: A web application where users can practice and compare their prompt-writing skills for image generation. It matches the generated image against a given image to assess prompt accuracy.

projects.title: AI Mock Interview Tool
projects.description: An AI-powered interview preparation platform that allows users to practice for interviews, receive real-time feedback, and improve their performance through mock sessions.

projects.title: Floating Cart UI Project
projects.description: A responsive front-end project featuring a 'floating cart' component, created as a tutorial build from the 'Serians Coding' YouTube channel. It demonstrates key UI/UX concepts for e-commerce.
projects.image: [Image representing a website with a floating shopping cart]
